response.original_title: Classic Archive: The French Piano School
response.overview: Featuring works by Ravel, Beethoven and Fauré, this Classic Archive installment spotlights the artistry and technique of the French piano school via recitals by three gifted musicians: Vlado Perlemuter, Yvonne Lefébure and Robert Casadesus. The program also includes a pair of bonus performances by pianists Hephzibah Menuhin, who studied under Marcel Ciampi, and Dino Ciani, a pupil of Alfred Cortot's.
response.title: Classic Archive: The French Piano School
